column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went this evening with a friend of mine around 7pm there was a line but luckily I made reservations days ago.  We were seated out in the patio with a wobbly table which the server quickly took care of it for us.  We started with the black raspberry sangria which I've fallen in love with I will never drink any other sangria again since my taste buds will be looking for that blk rasp sangria.  We ordered the following:
